channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Poorly repaired pothole, 25th June
item.description:
This pothole has reappeared on a number of occasions. You really must do better and stop wasting public money

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rattling drain cover, 25th June
item.description:
This drain cover, and many others including manholes covers, are loose and are causing significant vibration in the local vicinity and is elevated in frequency when large lorries and buses pas over them. Please make the necessary repairs which had been schedule 3 or 4 times now and was originally reported in 2023 although has been ongoing for many years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 25th June
item.description:
ENWD CWPH 500 X 500 X 70mm 15DB NARROW ROAD MARKED X (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole covers are not fit for purpose, 25th June
item.description:
After several promised dates to fix these problems I note once again that the last promised date has been missed. Your an absolute joke and I will now be pressing these issues with my councillor & MP as its just not good enough. The whole road needs to be replaced and probably all of the drainage which was obviously poorly installed originally.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet
